title: Who is responsible for clearing snow and spreading grit in Germany?

Wenn Sie neu im Land sind, ist es wichtig, Ihre gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen bezüglich der Schneeräumung und des Streuens zu kennen.

Alex Bierens de Haan/Getty Images

Plus 2.500 volatus et Amstelodami, unus nisl frequentissimus Europae, ab Veneris die remissum est.

title: Hundreds of school buses across Alberta delayed Monday as snow plagues road conditions
description: As students in Alberta returned to school after the holidays on Monday, hundreds of school buses across the province were delayed, according to the president of the Alberta School Bus Contractors' Association.
content:
School buses across Alberta faced delays on Monday as work continues to clear snow from roads  after heavy snowfall over the holidays.
Mark Critch, president of the Alberta School Bus Contractors' A… [+3829 chars]

Als die Schüler in Alberta am Montag nach den Ferien zur Schule zurückkehrten, kam es nach Angaben des Präsidenten der Alberta School Bus Contractors' Association zu Hunderten Verspätungen in der gesamten Provinz.
en: Hundreds of school buses across Alberta delayed Monday as snow plagues road conditions. As students in Alberta returned to school after the holidays on Monday, hundreds of school buses across the province were delayed, according to the president of the Alberta School Bus Contractors' Association.
la: Centum ludi buses trans Alberta morati sunt Lunae sicut plagae nivis in via condiciones. Cum alumni in Alberta ad scholam redierunt post ferias Lunae, centum negotia gymnasiorum per provinciam morata sunt, secundum Praesidem Associationis Consociationis Alberta School Bus Redemptoris.

title: Which parts of Germany are seeing the most snow?
description: Germany is experiencing a wintry spell, with plenty of snow blanketing many regions – but not everywhere. At the same time, the German Weather Service has issued official warnings for severe frost in parts of the country.

de: In welchen Teilen Deutschlands schneit es am meisten? Deutschland erlebt einen Wintereinbruch, in vielen Regionen liegt reichlich Schnee – aber nicht überall. Gleichzeitig hat der Deutsche Wetterdienst amtlich vor starkem Frost in Teilen des Landes gewarnt.
en: Which parts of Germany are seeing the most snow?. Germany is experiencing a wintry spell, with plenty of snow blanketing many regions – but not everywhere. At the same time, the German Weather Service has issued official warnings for severe frost in parts of the country.
la: Quae partes Germaniae maxime nives vident. Germania hibernam incantationem experitur, nivis copia multas regiones stragulas - sed non ubique. Eodem tempore, Germanica Tempestas Servitio officiales admonitiones pro rigore in partibus patriae promulgavit.

title: Eight flights cancelled at Dublin Airport as snowstorm in Europe continues to cause disruption
description: A number of flights have been cancelled at Dublin Airport as a snowstorm is still affecting parts of continental Europe.
content: A number of flights have been cancelled at Dublin Airport as a snowstorm is still affecting parts of continental Europe.While the snow and ice weather warnings in Ireland expired this morning and the… [+2743 chars]
de: Acht Flüge am Flughafen Dublin wurden gestrichen, da der Schneesturm in Europa weiterhin für Störungen sorgt. Am Flughafen Dublin wurden mehrere Flüge gestrichen, da noch immer ein Schneesturm Teile Kontinentaleuropas heimsucht.
en: Eight flights cancelled at Dublin Airport as snowstorm in Europe continues to cause disruption. A number of flights have been cancelled at Dublin Airport as a snowstorm is still affecting parts of continental Europe.
la: Octo volatus apud Dublin Airport ut nivis in Europa cassari pergit perturbare. Plures volatus apud Dublin Airport sicut nivis tempestas cassata est adhuc partes Europae continentales afficientes.

title: Icy cold snap grips swathes of Europe, disrupting travel
description: AMSTERDAM, ‌Jan 6 (Reuters) - Freezing weather gripped swathes of Europe on Tuesday, with snow and icy conditions forcing the cancellation ‌of hundreds of flights in the Netherlands and leading to the deaths of five people on French roads. Read full story
content: AMSTERDAM, Jan 6 (Reuters) - Freezing weather gripped swathes of Europe on Tuesday, with snow and icy conditions forcing the cancellation of hundreds of flights in the Netherlands and leading to the … [+2889 chars]
de: Eisige Kälte erfasst weite Teile Europas und stört den Reiseverkehr. AMSTERDAM, 6. Januar (Reuters) – Am Dienstag herrschte eisiges Wetter in weiten Teilen Europas. Schnee und Eis erzwangen die Annullierung von Hunderten von Flügen in den Niederlanden und führten zum Tod von fünf Menschen auf französischen Straßen. Lesen Sie die ganze Geschichte
en: Icy cold snap grips swathes of Europe, disrupting travel. AMSTERDAM, ‌Jan 6 (Reuters) - Freezing weather gripped swathes of Europe on Tuesday, with snow and icy conditions forcing the cancellation ‌of hundreds of flights in the Netherlands and leading to the deaths of five people on French roads. Read full story
la: Frigida concrepuit glacialis concrepatio Europaeae, itinera dissipans. AMSTERDAM, Ian 6 (Reuters) - Tempestas congelata in Europa involuta die Martis, cum condiciones nives et glaciales cogens indultum centenis volatus in Belgio et ad mortibus quinque hominum in viis Gallicis ducens.
